code: import{Box,Button,Container,FormLabel,Heading,Input,VStack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import React,{useState}from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{login}from'../../redux/actions/user';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const dispatch=useDispatch();const submitHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();dispatch(login(email,password));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{h:'125vh',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{h:'full',justifyContent:"center",spacing:'16',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{children:'Welcome to CourseMania'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:submitHandler,style:{width:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{my:'4',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormLabel,{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{required:true,id:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"abc@gmail.com",type:'email',focusBorderColor:"yellow.500"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{my:'4',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormLabel,{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{required:true,id:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter Your Password",type:'password',focusBorderColor:"yellow.500"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/forgetpassword",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{fontSize:'sm',variant:"link",children:"Forget Password?"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{my:"4",colorScheme:'yellow',type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{my:"4",children:["New User?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/register",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{colorScheme:'yellow',variant:"link",children:"Sign Up"}),' ',"here"]})]})]})]})});};export default Login;
